00016 // Konstruktor
00017 DbjProjectionTuple::DbjProjectionTuple(
00018         const Uint16 *colmap, const Uint16 colmapSize)
00019     : origTuple(NULL), mapping(colmap), mappingSize(colmapSize)
00020 {
00021     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00022 
00023     if (!mapping || colmapSize < 1) {
00024         DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_PARAMETER_FAIL);
00025     }
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 // Initialisiere mit neuem Tupel
00030 DbjErrorCode DbjProjectionTuple::initialize(DbjTuple *tuple)
00031 {
00032     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00033 
00034     if (!tuple) {
00035         DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_PARAMETER_FAIL);
00036         goto cleanup;
00037     }
00038     origTuple = tuple;
00039 
00040  cleanup:
00041     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 DbjErrorCode DbjProjectionTuple::getVarchar(const Uint16 columnNumber, 
00046         const char *&stringValue, Uint16 &stringLength) const 
00047 {
00048     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00049     if (columnNumber >= getNumberColumns()) {
00050         DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_PARAMETER_FAIL);
00051         return DbjGetErrorCode();
00052     }
00053     return origTuple->getVarchar(mapping[columnNumber], stringValue,
00054             stringLength);
00055 }
00056
